entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider FIPS testing #110625
  • net9.0 Blazor Server NU1102 on dotnet restore --runtime linux-x64 #110624
  • [browser] Add test for OutputType=Library #110620
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ReadOnlySpan<char> based overload for Uri.CheckHostName #110615
    Future
  • string.Contains returns wrong result on net-ios with .net 9 #110609
  • GC crash in .NET 9 UWP and WinUI 3 apps published with Native AOT on win-x86 #110607
  • ILLink PEVerify testing cannot handle rewritten methods #110605
  • Mono runtime unable to set callspec and utilize them #110601
    10.0.0
  • Obsolete message on SslStream is wrong #110600
    10.0.0
  • [HTTP Connection Pool] Lack of timeout on SSL connection establishment caused high number of pending connections in pool #110598

Closed

  • Process not responsive dump indicates garbage collection #110350
    10.0.0
  • Deadlock in GC when attached profiler calls ICorProfilerInfo4::EnumThreads using .NET9 runtime #110062
    10.0.0
  • TensorTests.cs and Tensor.cs StdDev calculates Variance rather than Standard deviations #110381
  • VisualStudio Version 17.13.0 Preview 1.0 still want to install .Net 9 RC2 on WSL/Unbuntu #109747
  • IOptionsMonitor does not handle named options correctly #110595
    Future
  • Test Failure: JIT/Methodical/cctor/xassem/xprecise1_cs_do/xprecise1_cs_do.cmd #108375
    9.0.0
  • [browser] HybridGlobalization, turkish i does not behave like non-Hybrid #95503
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Environment.GetRequiredEnvironmentVariable #110603
  • ilc fails with "An item with the same key has already been added. Key: [S.P.CoreLib]System.AppContext.OnFirstChanceException(object)" #110608
  • Test failures in `JSImportGenerator.Unit.Tests.Compiles.ValidateGeneratedSourceOutput` #110575
  • AssemblyLoadContext load "System.Management" throw System.PlatformNotSupportedException #110604
  • windows/x64: Assertion failed 'unreached' during 'Physical promotion' #110326
    10.0.0
  • Use background Service With SignlarR In Blazor #109711

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix a comment to match the function signature #110631
    area-VM-coreclr
  • exclude obj/cmake from codeql. #110630
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0-staging] Use FLS detach as thread termination notification on windows. #110629
    Servicing-consider, os-windows, area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove HttpMetricsEnrichmentContext caching #110628
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x
  • Remove Helper Method Frames (HMF) from Reflection #110627
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] Remove HttpMetricsEnrichmentContext caching #110626
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.x
  • [draft] unordered, vectorized Dictionary #110623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • Support disabling event tracing #110622
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • [Mono]: Update Mono diagnostic docs. #110621
    area-Tracing-mono
  • SPMI: Avoid duplicate example diffs in diffs summary #110619
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono]: Fix Mono profiler EventPipe provider instrumentation feature. #110618
    area-Tracing-mono
  • Added a Dynamic Event for OOM Reporting #110617
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Generate CFG-enabled VxSortDisabled flavor of runtime libs #110613
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove always-true `fgCanRelocateEHRegions` #110612
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] NativeAOT-LLVM support in browser-bench #110611
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Fix reporting of tier name metadata #110610
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] fix code gen overflow - reapply #110606
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [cdac] Handle non-IL method descs in `RuntimeTypeSystem_1.GetMethodClassificationDataType` #110602
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0

Merged

  • Use FLS detach as thread termination notification on windows. #110589
    os-windows, area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove HttpMetricsEnrichmentContext caching #110580
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • [Profiler] Avoid Recursive ThreadStoreLock in Profiling Thread Enumerator #110548
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix TensorExtensions.StdDev #110392
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] [debugger] Support step into a tail call #110438
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.2
  • [release/9.0-staging] [debugger] Fix a step that becomes a go #110533
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.2
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix Tizen linux-armel build #110614
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • fix wrong arguments order in CrlCacheExpired call #110457
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [browser] Remove WASM `HybridGlobalization` from library tests, WBT and docs #110534
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Fix comments in AggregateException.GetBaseException() #107743
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Revert "[browser] fix code gen overflow" #110599
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [cDAC] SOSDacImpl::GetMethodDescData DynamicMethodObject #110545
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Ensure that we don't try and optimize masks for promoted fields #110485
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Share threadpool configuration #110469
    area-System.Threading
  • Cleanup some dead code #110579
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Spill newarr into temp #110518
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging][wasm] Workaround incorrect mono restore when building WBT #110590
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono
  • Avoid all compiler optimization on embedded apphost hash #110554
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [cDAC] Implement GCCover portion of SOSDacImpl::GetMethodDescData #110322
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Reduce memory usage when updating ZipArchives #102704
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Add an "init BB" invariant #110404
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix potential NRE in GenericSpecializationPartCreationInfo #110569
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Beginnings of native Android build #110471
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android
  • Updating xarch to utilize EVEX compares and blending where possible #110342
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Warn on method access in Requires analyzers #110086
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • More WriteGather fixes #109826
    area-System.IO, 10.0.0
  • Update to .NET 10 build images #110198
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add vector support to System.Numerics.Tensors.TensorPrimitives.LeadingZeroCount for Byte and Int16 #110333
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] JIT: Read back all replacements before statements with implicit EH control flow #109143
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.2
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use static project from assets or `dotnet new`, unification of browser tests #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • [browser] Remove WASM `HybridGlobalization` from runtime code #110567
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] JIT: Include more edges in `BlockDominancePreds` to avoid a JIT crash #110568
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.2
  • [NRBF] skip the most time-consuming test case for non-Release builds to avoid timeouts for checked builds #110550
    area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 10.0.0
  • Warn on message formatting failure instead of crash, and fix Native AOT MakeGenericType failure #110330
    linkable-framework, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • [browser][MT] fix EventPipe demo after running mono on deputy #110544
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Switch to Azure Linux VM #108967
    area-Infrastructure
  • Change RSA.LegalKeySizes for Apple platforms to return 8192 #110591
    area-System.Security
  • JIT: boost inlining when callee unboxes an arg #110596
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix aka.ms URL in host's missing framework error #110513
    area-Host, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-11
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Native aot on blazor #2866

PullRequests

    area-SwiftBindings

Merged

Updated

    area-async

    * NO MERGE *

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tests failed in CI: restore failed with Response status code does not indicate success: 409 (Public access is not permitted on this storage account #45417

Closed

  • Hot Reload Target Process is wrong on MacOs #45399
  • dotnet 9 fails on macOS Catalina due to a missing symbol in libc++ #45382

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix a set of test issues caused by an old blob feed and try to fix up the nullable change we rushed in #45420
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [DO NOT MERGE} Skip a few tests on osx #45419
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • Read global.json to decide to run dotnet test in vstest or testing platform mode #45418
    Area-DotNet Test, config-system-candidate
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Upgrade latest Alpine to 3.21 for VMR builds #45416
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Upgrade latest Alpine to 3.21 for VMR builds #45415
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Initialization Stopwatch class #45413
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [WASM] Clean up of `HybridGlobalization` in tests #45412
    Area-Infrastructure, arch-wasm, untriaged, 10.0.1xx

    untriaged, Area-Templates
  • Add netcoreapp9.1 tfm to It_fails_to_build_if_targeting_a_higher_framework_than_is_supported test #45409

Merged

  • [main] Unlock build failed due to enabling nullable #45411
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Restore detailed test logging to console output #45343
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • format: stop checking for dotnet cli version #44958
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Run all steps in a container #44969
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix manifest artifacts reading #45407
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Fix incorrect apphost being used when publishing for self-contained single-file with `NoBuild=true` #45400
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [release/9.0.2xx] Copy dump file to the Helix upload location #45385
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use legacy WASM APIs when newer ones are not available #45317
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Fixes middleware invocation arguments use by legacy apply update code path #45298
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • File watcher improvements #45131
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Remove global usings from projects building source packages #45339
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #45365
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Use library-packs also when RestoreAdditionalProjectSources is explicitly set. #44863
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [9.0.2xx] sln migrate, sln list, sln add #45408
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add VMR leg that builds test projects #44843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support package@version syntax for dotnet workload search/update/install version Fixes #42367 #45156
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • sln-remove: Support for slnx #45160
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add hook for importing .props file after .NET SDK props #45151
    untriaged, Area-ILLink, consider-for-documentation
  • Dotnet test integration 2 #45398
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Dotnet test integration (first part) #44268
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #45392
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable Nullable Reference Types in Test Projects #44862

  • Prepare GenAPI so it can be used for a new assembly diff generator #45389

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make EditorConfigNamingStyleParser.ParseDictionary results deterministic when priority is specified #76381
  • False positive IDE0079 #76379
  • Unexpected ref safety error reported when a collection expression is used to construct a ref struct with Add method #76374
  • IDE0260 code fixer produces invalid code (CS0165) #76372
    Backlog
  • Find-all-references fails on `SyntaxTree` in VSCode #76367

Closed

  • function and methods custom have different color. #63954
  • Editorconfig UTF-8 BOM setting is ignored when creating a new file #66907
  • editor taking spacebar to mean acceptance of autocompletion suggestions #69591
  • Cloning a .NET 8 record deriving from a .NET 7 record leads to loss of members #72357
    17.14
  • Intellisense doesn't show a const class member #23740
    Backlog
  • VB auto-completion on parameter names introduces duplicate := #17730
    Backlog
  • [request] Ability to sort CompletionItem by type inheritance #16685
    Backlog
  • 'New' preselection prepends namespace when preselected type name matches containing method name #9763
    Backlog
  • Provide a contextual IntelliSense option #24226
    Backlog
  • Extract local function includes nameof parameter #55887
    Backlog
  • Completion grouping #19256
    Backlog
  • Extract Method refactoring ignores Prefer 'this.' Code Style preference #33618
    Backlog
  • IDE0079 triggering false positives on various suppressed diagnostics #75887
  • False positive `IDE0241 Nullable directive is unnecessary` #75951
  • Crash in the compiler when trying random things out with the "Implicit index access" feature syntax #76277
    17.13
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35610.96 #76364

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP: Initial work to support returning tuples in extract method when ref/out are not possible. #76383
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • *** WIP -- Cache the compilation states in compilation order to avoid recalculation #76380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add support for extract method in the PrimaryConstructor base list #76371
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reduce allocations in WithUsingNamespacesAndTypesBinder.GetForwardedToAssemblyInUsingNamespaces #76370
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Switch code in extract method to using immutable arrays #76378
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Do not bail generating base type initializer in the presence of use site warnings #76347
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove an enumerator allocation in SymbolCompletionItem.CreateWorker #76375
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Language feature status: add dictionary expressions #76377
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions, Next
  • Reduce allocations in ProjectState's ctor #76369
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Reduce allocations in CompletionItem.GetEntireDisplayText #76373
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Reduce allocations in AbstractSymbolCompletionProvider.UnionSymbols #76368
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Reduce allocations in AbstractRecommendationServiceBasedCompletionProvider.GetSymbolsAsync #76365
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Handle other object initializer kinds in ref safety analysis #76339
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Ensure that 'extract method' follows the user's 'use this/me' preference #76366
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Initialize fields when possible when adding parameters to constructors. #76352
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.12 to release/dev17.13 #76384
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Reduce allocations from doing repeated adds into an ImmutableDictionary in SolutionCompilationState.ComputeFrozenSnapshot #76361
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Mark interceptors feature as stable and deprecate file path based attributes #76312
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature - Interceptors
  • [WIP] Change PR Val builds to be test signed #76358
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Dictionary expressions: initial binding and lowering support #76257
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Implement editorconfig serializer for naming style preferences #76350
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Razor synchronize loader #76357
    Area-Compilers
  • Update 'add parameter' to assign to field/property when adding a parameter to a primary constructor. #76360
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Prefer ReadOnlySpan over Span as better conversion target #76300
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Check ref safety of arg mixing in collection initializers #76237
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Ref Fields, 17.13
  • Avoid reusing temps whose refs might be captured #76009
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove scope variance exceptions #76296
    Area-Compilers
  • Warn for redundant pattern in `not ... or <redundant>` pattern #75581
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Do not report conflicting types errors for source-generated APIs #71546
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Do not check overridden required members during in-type member enforcement #76363
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor - Static SSR Edit Form two-way databinding not behaving correctly with nested types #59446
  • ASP.NET Core Roadmap for .NET 10 #59443
  • Metrics for improved memory pool diagnosability #59442
    .NET 10 Planning
  • [Blazor] First class integration with HttpClientFactory #59440
  • [Blazor] Communicate with a circuit instance from outside of the circuit #59439
  • Challenges in using WebApplication.CreateEmptyBuilder #59437
    Backlog
  • OpenApi doc is not generated at build time #59434
  • Add template for Blazor Web App with Web Api backend #59433
  • Perf improvement: updates #59430
  • NET9 - warnings on building Blazor Wasm project (WASM0060, WASM0062, WASM0001) #59429
  • .NET 9 OpenAPI not working with nullable property with MaxLengthAttribute #59428
  • [Critical] ASP.NET Core 9.0: AddOpenApi duplicates schema with a number suffix #59427
  • Check that HttpSys and IIS TLS support isn't impacted by obsolete members on ITlsHandshakeFeature #59426
    10.0-preview1

Closed

  • Hosting bundle do not uninstall old dotnet version #59202
  • Support Blazor .Net 8 Microsoft.Identity.Web client for Azure clients #51374
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Perf regression: json #59410
  • Perf regression: single_query #59431
  • [Blazor] Cascading RouteData in Layout causes OnInitializedAsync to be called twice when navigating to another Layout #20637
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Access is denied - VS 17.12.3 #59342
  • [Blazor] MapStaticAssets incorrectly re-encodes files when running the published output in the development environment. #56742
    .NET 10 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Use a live crossgen2 for all builds #59447
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix loading dotnet user-jwts config #59425
    area-commandlinetools

Merged

  • Upload binlogs in default build scenarios #59445
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • [Infrastructure] Script to automatically update Selenium and Playwright dependencies #59338
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-alpha.1.24609.2 #59389
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Use the Installers Arcade package to build the ref pack and targeting pack installers #59406
    area-infrastructure
  • [DRAFT] perf: improve ManagedAuthenticatedEncryptor.Decrypt flow #59424
    area-dataprotection
  • Fix race condition in RedisCache when setting key expiration #59212
    bug, community-contribution, feature-caching, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Fix: Include .webmanifest in Offline Cache for Default PWA Service Worker #59231
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/2.3] Fix Mvc.FunctionalTests referencing RazorPagesClassLibrary #59361
    area-mvc
  • Fix EventCountersAndMetricsValues and VerifyCountersFireWithCorrectValues flaky tests #59411
    area-hosting
  • Fix: Handle null event.submitter in enhanced form submission #59207
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/9.0] Fix MultipartReaderStream synchronous read when using buffer offset #59422
    Servicing-approved, area-networking, 9.0.x
  • Retry `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Core.Tests.Http2ConnectionTests.AbortSendsFinalGOAWAY` #59359
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • New CollectionView2 Handler does not attach Behaviors in Datatemplate #26551
  • Output Layout is in the newest version og Visualstudio 222 preview more difficult #26547
  • Windows: Referencing a nuget package that uses WinAppSDK 1.6 causes crash in Maui's WebView control #26546
    Backlog
  • Unable to remove new secondary navigation/title bar on Android #26544
  • [Android] Some phones MediaPicker.Default.CapturePhotoAsync() is causing app reset .NET 9 and crash on others #26541
  • [Windows]Exception throw when using the GroupShortNameBinding property in Grouped ListView #26534
    Backlog
  • When changing BindingContext, the previously bound item can have it's Picker.SelectedItem property changed! #26532
  • Unable to load MacCatalyst Arm64 dll #26529
  • [MAUI] When switching the theme from Light to Dark some text disappear. #26526
    .NET 9 Servicing

Closed

  • Get C# Stack trace of MAUI iOS without using any CrashAnalytics #26414
  • Enable .NET MAUI on source.dot.net #26210
    .NET 9 SR3
  • [iOS] New CollectionViewHandler2 "swallows" attached properties #25195
    .NET 9 SR3
  • After Installing VS 17.12, iOS Debugging Only Works Once #26528
  • Header Not Rendering in Windows for Grouped ListView #26540
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Fix CarouselViewRemoveAt so that it's passing on both CV1 and CV2 sets of handlers #25776
    .NET 9 SR3
  • System image download error. #26487
  • Member 'Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Color' is declared in another module and needs to be imported #26531
  • [CollectionView] EmptyView with button doesn't t work on iOS #26508
    .NET 9 SR3
  • Unable to set multiple different colours for unselected tabs on TabbedPage - Android #26522
  • Android FlyoutPage does not display navigation bar NET 8 #26472
  • Error on dotnet workload install or update #26518
  • MAUI App re-installs every time its deployed via VS Code #26525
  • CollectionView Header and Footer leak memory on iOS #22910

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove CastingList from MenuFlyoutSubItem #26558
    .NET 9 SR3
  • [ci] Enable source index #26557
    area-infrastructure, t/docs 📝, .NET 9 SR3

  • [tests] Skip some tests that are failing #26552

    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Set SetClipChildren to false in ViewCellContainer #26524
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-listview

Merged

  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #26545
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR3
  • Revert "[release/9.0.1xx-sr2] [Windows] Fix crash when navigating pages" (#26478) #26549
  • Update bug-report.yml with SR1.4 #26550
  • [iOS] Moved GeneralWrapperView from Controls to Core #26535
    area-architecture, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Entity Framework Code Configuration Altered After Update #35321
  • Historical value of entity #35320
  • Consider having AssertTranslation that tests both predicate and projection #35318
    Backlog
  • Cosmos: Translate Enum.HasFlag #35317
    Backlog
  • Unneeded sorted subquery with Skip() #35316
    Backlog
  • Group By Failure - Translation of 'Select' which contains grouping parameter without composition is not supported #35315
  • [Q] Map JSON column to both string and strongly-typed data #35313

Closed

  • EF Core 9: when altering views in migrationbuilder.Sql(), script-migration now creates multiple statements in the batch #35309
  • Issue with EFScaffoldModelStage and entity named Module #35304
  • Issues with EF Core 8 Model Compilation #35305
  • How to fetch count using raw request? #35322
  • Integer division might return unexpected results #35295
  • Why is a type discriminator not supported in TPT mapping strategy? #35286
  • Unable to cast and similar exceptions should include property and entity name when feasible. #35306
  • EF Core 9: HierarchyId extension registration API is missing for Azure SQL #35307

PullRequests

Created

  • Refactor method/member translation tests into their own suite #35319
  • Create table mappings for complex types in TPC #35314

Merged

  • Update BenchmarkDotNet #35312

Updated

  • Interpretation testing #35308
  • Add SqlServer translation for DateOnly.ToDateTime(timeOnly) #35194

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-11
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Upgrade latest Alpine to 3.21 for VMR builds #20264
